ca.ualberta.cs.completemytask.activities
Class AudioCaptureActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cs.completemytask.activities.CustomActivity
          ca.ualberta.cs.completemytask.activities.AudioCaptureActivity

public class AudioCaptureActivity
extends CustomActivity

Handles the adding of audio files. The user is able to record an audio clip, sample it and then cancel, reset or submit it. The audio is then added to the Task or discarded.

Author:
Ian Watts

Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

onCreateOptionsMenu

public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)

recordInitialize

public void recordInitialize()
Handles the setup of the MediaRecorder recorder that occurs on startup and after stopping and resetting.

closePlayer

public void closePlayer()
Closes the mediaPlayer currently in use and sets it back to null. Used to make sure the Player is never in the incorrect state when certain buttons are pressed.

recordStart

public void recordStart(View view)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Starts the recording of audio on button press. Audio is captured until user hits stop

Throws:
java.io.IOException

recordReset

public void recordReset(View view)
Resets the recording of audio on button press. New audio can be captured by pressing start again. Sets the temp file back to null to prevent Start>Stop>Start>Submit from working

recordStop

public void recordStop(View view)
Stops the recording of audio and prepares it for submission

Parameters:
view -

playAudio

public void playAudio(View view)
Opens a MediaPlayer and plays the current audio clip. Lets the user sample the audio they are going to submit.

Parameters:
view -

stopAudio

public void stopAudio(View view)
Button response that will stop the mediaPlayer currently playing

Parameters:
view -

deleteTempFile

public void deleteTempFile()
Deletes the leftover audio file on the SD card if it exists

Parameters:
view -

getByteFromFile

public byte[] getByteFromFile(java.io.File audioFile)
This functions converts audio file to a byte array which can be passed back in the intent

submitAudio

public void submitAudio(View view)
Returns the audio and the audioName back in the intent. If the tempAudioFile is empty --> RESULT_CANCELED since there is nothing to submit

Parameters:
view -

close

public void close(View view)
Closes the task. RESULT_CANCELED since the user does not want to submit

Parameters:
view -
